articles.description: Europe make the perfect start in their quest to regain the Ryder Cup by making a clean sweep of Friday's opening session to lead the United States 4-0.

articles.description: Manchester United confirm Brazilian winger Antony is to return to training after allegations of domestic abuse were made against him.

articles.description: Russian para-athletes will be allowed to compete at the 2024 Paralympics in Paris after the International Paralympic Committee votes against a full ban.
articles.title: Russian para-athletes to compete at 2024 Paralympics

articles.description: After a troubled build-up to the World Cup, England have secured their place in the quarter-finals with a game to spare.

articles.description: Manchester's Jordan Thompson, who challenges Jai Opetaia for the IBF belt on Saturday, has gone from budding tennis star to boxing world title challenger.

articles.description: West Ham defender Hawa Cissoko says she was "surprised" by the racist abuse she suffered online after a Women's Super League match last season.
